attributes.action: scrap the planned fuel duty rise for April 2008.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The vast majority of people in this country are against fuel duty rises, especially as the UK leads the world on high prices.

In order to prevent the people of this country having to take direct action to demonstrate that we feel it is unacceptable to have steadily rising tax on fuel, please reduce it, cap it and leave it alone.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
